bug.author: maria-korosteleva
bug.summary: Artifacts: Run outputting many versions causes page to hang and then crash
bug.description:
wandb --version && python --version && uname
Weights and Biases version: 0.9.5 Python version: 3.6.10 Operating System: Win10 Browser: Google Chrome v.85.0.4183.83
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
For some of my runs, the artifacts page refuses to load. It hangs and eventually crashes with memory error e.g. <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/maria_korosteleva/Garments-Reconstruction/runs/veeany7a/artifacts?workspace=user-maria_korosteleva>https://app.wandb.ai/maria_korosteleva/Garments-Reconstruction/runs/veeany7a/artifacts?workspace=user-maria_korosteleva</denchmark-link>
There is also some Error in browser Console <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6837635/92206488-8de6ca00-eec2-11ea-861e-d60fcaff3d52.png></denchmark-link>
There are runs, for which the page loads just fine: <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/maria_korosteleva/Garments-Reconstruction/runs/29iczuwn/artifacts?workspace=user-maria_korosteleva>https://app.wandb.ai/maria_korosteleva/Garments-Reconstruction/runs/29iczuwn/artifacts?workspace=user-maria_korosteleva</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>What I did</denchmark-h>
It started to happen with the runs when I started to upload an additional artifact with multiple versions. Previously, I had 3 artifacts created within a run, one of which added with many versions (checkpoints after every epoch), for the other two, only one new version is created per run => page loads fine Now I have 4 artifacts, two of which are created with a number of versions => Page crashes

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.98. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Hi Maria, thanks for filing this. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/annirudh>@annirudh</denchmark-link> could you take a look

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/maria-korosteleva>@maria-korosteleva</denchmark-link> thanks for sharing a link to a page that is working correctly. Could you please share a link to a page that crashes?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/cvphelps>@cvphelps</denchmark-link> , the very first link is the one with the problem. Does it open correctly for you?

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/maria-korosteleva>@maria-korosteleva</denchmark-link> , thanks for the detailed bug report! I have a fix for the issue that we'll deploy ASAP. Once the fix is live, I'll circle back with you here.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/maria-korosteleva>@maria-korosteleva</denchmark-link> The issue should be fixed now. Sorry for any inconvenience this caused!
